column2: Choose to become a mage or not.
Risk your life on a quest to improve your ability as a mage or to find treasure!
Learn to master the stealthy power of air!
Learn to master the summoning powers of earth!
Learn to master the destructive power of fire!
Learn to master the healing power of water!
Cure target of wounds and most illnesses!
Start a new life by taking the targets titles and abdicating your titles to the target!
Plague the target with a terrible sickness!
Bestow the gift of immortality to this mortal!
